statements: UPDATE identity_theft_alerts SET alert_level = 2 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE identity_theft_alerts SET activity_description = 'Unauthorized login attempt' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE identity_theft_alerts SET alert_level = 3, activity_description = 'Suspicious Login Attempt' WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_timestamp = '2022-01-15 09:30:00';
UPDATE identity_theft_alerts SET activity_description = 'Unauthorized Purchase', alert_level = 2 WHERE activity_timestamp = '2022-01-18 14:45:00' AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE suspicious_activities SET activity_type='Login Attempt', flagged=TRUE WHERE activity_id = 101;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', password='newpassword' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE suspicious_activities SET flagged=TRUE, alert_sent=TRUE, description='Suspicious activity detected' WHERE activity_id=5;
UPDATE identity_theft_alerts SET alert_message = 'Alert for potential fraud activity' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET user_role = 'admin', user_email = 'admin@example.com' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE identity_theft_alerts SET alert_message = 'Alert updated - Suspicious Activity Detected' WHERE alert_id = 101;
UPDATE users SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_message = 'Unauthorized access attempt detected' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET password = 'newpassword123' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE login_attempts SET success = TRUE, ip_address = '192.168.0.1' WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount=500.00 WHERE transaction_id=100;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', password='newpassword123' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE transactions SET amount=50.75, description='Purchase of groceries' WHERE transaction_id=1001;
